snippet: Lionel Messi scored twice for his eighth straight start and reached 90 goals for the calendar year as host Barcelona beat second-place Atletico Madrid, 4-1, in Spain’s top league.
abstract: Barcelona forward Lionel Messi reaches 90 goals for 2012 as Barcelona beat Atletico Madrid, 4-1, in Spanish league; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi scored twice for his eighth straight start and reached 90 goals for the calendar year as host Barcelona beat second-place Atletico Madrid, 4-1, in Spain’s top league.
